name: Chungholio Tower
description:
This is a simple game for Ludum Dare 41. The aim of the game is to ascend Chungholio's tower and destroy him by destroying generators and activating beacons througout the tower. (More info in the tutorial)

You will be required to dodge and shoot your way to glory but be careful! Falling off the tower, being slain by it's...less than friendly occupants of robots or succumbing to it's traps and hazards will put you back to the main menu. You'll have to do the whole thing over again. 

Note: The game is designed to be challenging and unfair. With time and exploration you will learn it's secrets. Be persistant.

All ratings and feedback are appreciated :)

The song in the background is El Magicia by Kevin Macleod
